lines: Bathe my trembling heart and brow;
Fill me with thy hallow`d presence,
Come, O come and fill me now.
Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus come and fill me now.
Fill me with thy hallow`d presence, Come, O come and fill me now.
Thou canst fill me gracious Spirit,
Tho` I can not tell thee how;
But I need thee, greatly need thee,
Come, O come and fill me now.
I am weaknes, full of weakness;
At thy sacred feet I bow;
Fill with love and fill me now.
Cleanse and comfort, bless and save;
Bathe, O, bathe my heart and brow;
